description: Test specification for the HelloWorld Vue component, verifying it renders correctly with given props.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for the HelloWorld component.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines an individual test case to check rendering.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Assertions to verify the component renders the expected text.

methods.name: mount
methods.description: Mounts the Vue component for testing with specified props.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
